definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: This rise has been paralleled by an increase in fluid milk intake.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病發病率的上升是與液體奶攝入量的增加並行的。

sentences.english: However, the HPA suggested flu rates in England were now coming down.
sentences.chinese: 不過，HPA表示，流感發病率在英國正在下降。

sentences.english: The highest incidence of AD was observed from 2 to 4 parity.
sentences.chinese: 真胃變位的發生以2～4胎次的奶牛發病率最高。

sentences.english: There has been a threefold increase in ectopic pregnancies in the U.S. since abortion was legalized.
sentences.chinese: 在美國，墮胎合法化後異位妊娠的發病率升高了3倍。

sentences.english: The incidence of olfactory neuroblastoma was the second common ocular malignant tumor.
sentences.chinese: 嗅神經母細胞瘤的發病率在惡性腫瘤中居第二位。

sentences.english: The frequency of such disorders during pregnancy and in the postpartum period was the same. Their prevalence was higher among women in rural provinces (odds ratio, OR: 2.17; 95% CI: 1.19–3.93);
sentences.chinese: 這種疾病的發病率在懷孕期和產後期是一樣的。

sentences.english: There is little seasonal variation in the incidence of the disease.
sentences.chinese: 在該病的發病率方面存在着極小的季節性差別。

sentences.english: One of the most formidable enemies hazarding human health is tumour, the incidence of which rises sharply year after year.
sentences.chinese: 腫瘤是人類健康大敵，其發病率也在逐年上升。

sentences.english: The prevalence of major depression was significantly higher among rural (6.11%) than among urban (5.16%) populations (p = 0.0171).
sentences.chinese: 主要抑鬱症的發病率在鄉村地區要顯著高於城市人口。

sentences.english: It showed that the incidence of drug eruption was increased along with the aging.
sentences.chinese: 我們發現藥疹的發病率隨年齡的增加而升高。

sentences.english: China is still some way off the cirrhosis death rates seen in Britain or Japan.
sentences.chinese: 這句話是說中國肝硬化發病率比英國和日本的低吧？

sentences.english: We compared the incidence of coronary heart disease and total mortality.
sentences.chinese: 我們將冠心病的發病率與總死亡率進行了比較。

sentences.english: China is one of countries with the highest-risk of carcinoma of esophagus in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我國是世界上食管癌發病率最高的國家之一。

sentences.english: Therefore complementing calcium in midterm pregnancy can reduce the morbidity of hypertension of pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 所以於妊娠中期補鈣可以降低妊高徵的發病率。

sentences.english: Numerous studies have shown an inverse relationship between a high dietary fiber and the risk of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 高膳食纖維飲食同部分癌腫發病率之間呈負相關關係。

sentences.english: Worldwide, the incidence of melanoma varies more than 150-fold.
sentences.chinese: 全世界黑素瘤發病率的差異超過150倍。

definition: (of diseases, accidents) to occur with a high incidence/(old) to score highly in the imperial exams
to make more youthful/to promote younger staff
to increase by degrees/in increasing order/incremental/progressive
subject (in an experiment)/participant (in a clinical trial etc)
